mailConfirmation.title: Check your mailbox!
mailConfirmation.description: We need you to confirm your email address to complete your registration.

resetPassword.title: Enter your email address
resetPassword.description: We'll send you a link to reset your password. Make sure the address is valid.

signUp.checkEmailAndConfirm: Check your email and click the confirmation link to activate your account.

errors.emailAlreadyInUse: This email address is already in use.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must contain at least 6 characters.

confirmPrivacyPolicy.part1: I confirm that I have read and accept

profile.provideFeedback: Have a suggestion? Write to us here!
profile.deleteAccountConfirmation: Delete my account and associated data. The deletion will be done once all ongoing reservations of your spot are completed.
profile.deleteAccountConfirm: I confirm I want to delete my account and understand this action is irreversible.

parking.cantFindParking: Can't find your parking? Create it now!

share.title: Share your FriendSpot parking group with your neighbors
share.message: Hi! Join our neighbor parking group on FriendSpot. Use the code {{code}}.

joinParking.title: Group found!
joinParking.description: Join an existing parking group using an invitation code.
joinParking.success: You have successfully joined the group!

error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

spot.title: Set your spot name
spot.description: Enter the number or name of your spot in this group.

parkingCode.title: Enter a group code
parkingCode.dismissCheck: I don't have a group code

acceptRequest.description: By accepting, your spot will be shared with {{requester}} from the {{from}} to the {{to}}.

wallet.title: My points
wallet.availableCreditsExplanation: Use these points to reserve an available spot.
